name: Surrogate
description: Your memories are beyond reach, a side effect of a life-saving operation. Stationed at an oxygen production facility you must oversee an exodus to the surface. When an army of rogue security robots is unleashed you commandeer a vehicle and choose your own unique path through the facility.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 3GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / ATI Radeon HD 4870 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 3.2GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / ATI Radeon HD 7970 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
